projects.name: Image Captioning
description: Image captioning using a transformer model, 90% accuracy against HumanEval benchmark

projects.name: Neural Architecture Search for Edge Devices
description: Developed AutoML framework discovering optimal CNN architectures for mobile deployment
Achieved 40% reduction in model size while maintaining 95% accuracy on ImageNet
Deployed models running at 60 FPS on iPhone and Android devices

projects.name: Real-time Sign Language Translator
description: Built end-to-end system translating ASL to text using computer vision and NLP
Collected and annotated dataset of 50K+ sign language gestures
Achieved 92% accuracy with 30ms latency on consumer webcams

projects.name: Distributed Training Framework
description: Created open-source library for distributed deep learning across heterogeneous GPUs
Implemented gradient compression reducing communication overhead by 75%
Used by 500+ researchers with 2K+ GitHub stars

projects.name: Music Generation with GANs
description: Implemented WaveGAN and MuseGAN for generating realistic music samples
Fine-tuned models on classical, jazz, and electronic music achieving MOS score of 3.8/5

projects.name: Smart Home Energy Optimizer
description: Built IoT system using reinforcement learning to reduce household energy consumption by 35%
Integrated with Nest, Philips Hue, and Tesla Powerwall APIs
Deployed on Raspberry Pi with real-time monitoring dashboard

projects.name: Code Review Assistant
description: Fine-tuned CodeBERT model to detect bugs and suggest improvements in pull requests
Integrated with GitHub API processing 1K+ PRs across 50 repositories

projects.name: 3D Object Reconstruction from Images
description: Implemented NeRF (Neural Radiance Fields) for photorealistic 3D scene reconstruction
Optimized training pipeline reducing rendering time from 2 hours to 15 minutes

projects.name: Sentiment Analysis API
description: Deployed BERT-based sentiment classifier as RESTful API handling 10K requests/day
Achieved 94% F1 score on custom e-commerce review dataset

projects.name: Autonomous Drone Navigation
description: Trained deep RL agent enabling drone to navigate obstacle courses autonomously
Simulated in Gazebo and deployed on DJI Tello achieving 85% success rate
Presented findings at university robotics symposium
